roles.title: Senior Front-End Developer
duties: Develop Influencer Marketing and Retail Analytic tools used by F500 companies.
Work with Back-End Developers to plan/suggest API changes and debug.
Assist in migrating the application from AngularJS to Vue.
Participate in daily stand-up to discuss tasks and goals for the day.

projects.name: Campaign Wizard
projects.details: Backstage tool which allows users to create campaigns, track products, add/interact with influencers, and view/provide feedback for content , an all-in-one process.

projects.name: Reporting Platform
projects.details: Backstage platform to view statistics, such as sales, top performers, day-to-day views for content on a per product/per influencer/ or per platform basis.

projects.name: Influencer Portal
projects.details: Allows influencers to upload concepts, content, and reports for social media posts.

projects.name: Custom Landing Pages
projects.details: Tool to allow followers/viewers of social media posts to select the retailer where the product is available to purchase the product.

projects.name: Retail Syndication
projects.details: Content syndication for products allowing users of Backstage to track every step of syndication from content creation to placement of the content on the product page of retailers.
